com.siemens.scp.standardbom

Class StandardBomParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siemens.scp.standardbom.StandardBomParser

  • public class StandardBomParser
extends Object
    Default serializer/deserializer for standard-bom files.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public StandardBom parse(File pJsonFile)
                  throws IOException,
                         ParseException
        Parse the given file as a Standard BOM.
        Parameters:
        pJsonFile - the file to read
        Returns:
        the parsed content as our DTOs which wrap CycloneDX DTOs
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - the given file was not found
        StandardBomException - missing, unsupported, or invalid format version
        ParseException - syntax error in JSON
        IOException - I/O error reading the file

      • parse

        public StandardBom parse(InputStream pJsonStream)
                  throws IOException,
                         ParseException
        Parse the given file as a Standard BOM. Older format versions are converted into the current DTO format if possible.
        Parameters:
        pJsonStream - an InputStream to read
        Returns:
        the parsed content as current DTOs
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - the given file was not found
        StandardBomException - missing, unsupported, or invalid format version
        ParseException - syntax error in JSON
        IOException - I/O error reading the file

      • save

        public void save(@Nonnull
                 StandardBom pBom,
                 @Nonnull
                 File pOutputFile)
          throws IOException
        Store the given Standard BOM in a file.
        Parameters:
        pBom - the BOM to save
        pOutputFile - the file to write to
        Throws:
        StandardBomException - serializing the given BOM failed
        IOException - I/O error writing to the given file

      • stringify

        @Nonnull
public String stringify(@Nonnull
                                 StandardBom pBom)
        Convert the given Standard BOM to a JSON String.
        Parameters:
        pBom - the BOM to convert. It will be modified slightly in the process, so do this last!
        Returns:
        the String representation in JSON format
        Throws:
        StandardBomException - conversion failed
